issue.title: [Rust] Refactor introduced a bug around Arrays of String
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2615](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2615). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The refactor unintentionally implemented the ArrowPrimitiveType trait for strings. This was not intended. This mistake leaked into one example and the record batch struct.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2615?focusedCommentId=16482446) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2070
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2070>
